TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi abstract sealed beforefieldinit ContractAdapter extends System.Object
public ref class ContractAdapter abstract sealed

summary.span: 提供用于共享和重新适应外接程序的方法。

span.span: Provides methods for sharing and readapting add-ins.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 你可以使用此类与不具有向该外接程序相同的管道的另一台主机共享外接程序 （具体来说，是不具有相同的另一个主机承载的外接程序的视图）。You can use this class to share an add-in with another host that does not have the same pipeline to that add-in (particularly, another host that does not have the same host view of the add-in). 如果你需要能够激活外接程序从其主机视图到的协定中，使用方法。If you need to adapt an activated add-in from its host view to the contract, use the method. 如果你有协定的实例，并且需要将其转换为主机视图，使用方法。If you have an instance of the contract and need to convert it to the host view, use the method.

summary.span: 如果在指定位置找到了适合的宿主端适配器，则获取外接程序的宿主视图。

span.span: Obtains a host view of an add-in if a suitable host-side adapter is found at a specified location.

MemberSignature.Value: public static TView ContractToViewAdapter<TView> (System.AddIn.Pipeline.ContractHandle contract, System.AddIn.Hosting.PipelineStoreLocation location);
.method public static hidebysig !!TView ContractToViewAdapter<TView>(class System.AddIn.Pipeline.ContractHandle contract, valuetype System.AddIn.Hosting.PipelineStoreLocation location) cil managed
Public Shared Function ContractToViewAdapter(Of TView) (contract As ContractHandle, location As PipelineStoreLocation) As TView

typeparam.name: TView
typeparam.span: 用于定义外接程序宿主视图的类型。

span.span: The type that defines the host view of the add-in.

param.name: contract
param.span: 要共享的外接程序所使用的协定句柄。

span.span: A handle to the contract used by the add-in to be shared.

summary.span: 如果在一个由 枚举中的值指定的位置找到了适合的宿主端适配器，则获取外接程序的宿主视图。

span.span: Obtains a host view of an add-in if a suitable host-side adapter is found at a location specified by a value from the enumeration.

returns.span: 所共享的外接程序的宿主视图。

span.span: The host view of the add-in that is shared.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 在此方案中，实体具有一个协定的实例，并希望使其满足特定的视图。In this scenario, an entity has an instance of a contract and wants to adapt it to a particular view. 使用此方法来查询系统以查找并实例化一个适配器来转换为该视图。Use this method to query the system to find and instantiate an adapter to convert into that view.

MemberSignature.Value: public static TView ContractToViewAdapter<TView> (System.AddIn.Pipeline.ContractHandle contract, string pipelineRoot);
.method public static hidebysig !!TView ContractToViewAdapter<TView>(class System.AddIn.Pipeline.ContractHandle contract, string pipelineRoot) cil managed
Public Shared Function ContractToViewAdapter(Of TView) (contract As ContractHandle, pipelineRoot As String) As TView

typeparam.name: TView
typeparam.span: 用于定义外接程序宿主视图的类型。

span.span: The type that defines the host view of the add-in.

param.name: contract
param.span: 要共享的外接程序所使用的协定句柄。

span.span: A handle to the contract used by the add-in to be shared.

param.name: pipelineRoot
param.span: 到外接程序存储区的路径。

span.span: A path to the add-in store.

summary.span: 如果在通过路径指定的位置找到了适合的宿主端适配器，则获取外接程序的宿主视图。

span.span: Obtains a host view of an add-in if a suitable host-side adapter is found at a location specified by a path.

returns.span: 所共享的外接程序的宿主视图。

span.span: The host view of the add-in that is shared.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 在此方案中，实体具有一个协定的实例，并希望使其满足特定的视图。In this scenario, an entity has an instance of a contract and wants to adapt it to a particular view. 使用此方法来查询系统以查找并实例化一个适配器来转换为该视图。Use this method to query the system to find and instantiate an adapter to convert into that view.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public static hidebysig class System.AddIn.Pipeline.ContractHandle ViewToContractAdapter(object view) cil managed
Public Shared Function ViewToContractAdapter (view As Object) As ContractHandle

param.name: view
param.span: 由系统从当前应用程序域中激活的外接程序的宿主视图。

span.span: The host view of an add-in activated by the system from the current application domain.

summary.span: 获取提供的外接程序宿主视图的协定句柄。

span.span: Gets the handle to the contract for a provided host view of an add-in.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 在此方案中，源实体 （主机） 具有想要共享的目标实体 （另一台主机） 的外接程序。In this scenario, the source entity (a host) has an add-in that wants to be shared by a destination entity (another host). 使用此方法以获取已为源实体实例化由外接程序系统的协定的句柄。Use this method to obtain the handle to the contract that was instantiated for the source entity by the add-in system.
